lines.text: I can't take anymore of this. I... I still love food and sex, you know. In fact, when I was alive, that's all I used to think about.
But this is too much, you know.
I can't, Simon. This is the way it is.
Then get me out of heaven. And how the fuck I got here in the first place? I'm a fucking thief. Bum. I never went to fucking church a day of my life.
[looking in her eyes, then lowering his head]
Simon... whoever said this was heaven?
